titleStmt.title: A brief and practical discourse of abstinence in time of Lent wherein is shewed the popular mistake and abuse of the word superstition / preached at the Cathedral of St. Patrick Dublin, on Ashwednesday March 1, 1681/2, by Peter Manby, Dean of Derry.
titleStmt.author: Manby, Peter, d. 1697.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Joseph Ray ... for William Winter, Bookseller ... and are to be sold by the rest of the booksellers,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
